channel.title: [508]Fearnypks revision 5 :( backwards
channel.description:
[u][b][size=20pt]current progress: 9%[/size]
[u][b][size=20pt]NEWS: server/client and backups were deleted from thumbdrive from glitch. redoing and doing it better again.[/size]
[size=20pt]current revision: 5[/size]
(every time the revision is updated the server has updated)
[size=20pt]Server news: added logger and script engine. its bugged and isn't loading data correctly, will fix soon. have implemented jython, mina, and others to the server.[/size]
[size=20pt]Client news: having to redo what took a while yesterday, will get around to this again
[img]http://i41.tinypic.com/2mi56b6.jpg[/img][/size]
[size=20pt]current pictures:[/size][/u]
[size=15pt] HD & LD comparison/support.
[URL=http://tinypic.com/view.php?pic=4livtd&s=5][IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/4livtd.jpg[/img][/URL]
Friends list
[URL=http://tinypic.com/view.php?pic=wu496o&s=5][IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/wu496o.jpg[/img][/URL]
Shops
[URL=http://tinypic.com/view.php?pic=2en2bso&s=5][IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2en2bso.jpg[/img][/URL]
[b]Trading
[URL=http://tinypic.com/view.php?pic=ipp11x&s=5][IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/ipp11x.jpg[/img][/URL] [/size]
[b] [size=20pt]
Progress on the varieties: [/size]
Legend key: maroon - thinking about it red - needs major updates/barely started orange - started/getting there but still has much work blue - farther than orange/acceptable for play but not done. green - acceptable level (might not be finished but at a good level of done)
repackaging: 0% Stapability: 10% Melee: 0% range: 0% Prayer: 0% Non-combat skills: 5% Economy: 55% magic: 45% Event manager: 75% (testing) HD and LD support: 90%
Non-Combat skills: we are currently not focusing on this as they can be fast and simple. We first have to start with stapability, adding the event manager, repackaging (we might), and combat.
We have not gone exactally far. but we have just started and the exams should/are be over (soon), so we will have much more time to use for this project.
im not sure if im allowed to post this but
Programmers: Beast43 Gods army
no dont ask if you can join, if we need you we ask you not vice versa.
other info:
release with trading shops etc (current progress) is here: http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,352304.0.html
SVN (so you can see the code progress if we dont add links and crap): coming soon. [/b]

item.dc:creator: @Gods_army Gods army
item.description:
@Gods_army wrote:

[u][b][size=20pt]current progress: 9%[/size]

[u][b][size=20pt]NEWS: server/client and backups were deleted from thumbdrive from glitch. redoing and doing it better again.[/size]

[size=20pt]current revision: 5[/size]

(every time the revision is updated the server has updated)

[size=20pt]Server news: added logger and script engine. its bugged and isn’t loading data correctly, will fix soon. have implemented jython, mina, and others to the server.[/size]

[size=20pt]Client news: having to redo what took a while yesterday, will get around to this again

2mi56b6.jpg749×336
[/size]

[size=20pt]current pictures:[/size][/u]

[size=15pt]
HD & LD comparison/support.

Friends list

Shops

[b]Trading


[/size]

[b]
[size=20pt]

Progress on the varieties:
[/size]

Legend key:
maroon - thinking about it
red - needs major updates/barely started
orange - started/getting there but still has much work
blue - farther than orange/acceptable for play but not done.
green - acceptable level (might not be finished but at a good level of done)

repackaging: 0%
Stapability: 10%
Melee: 0%
range: 0%
Prayer: 0%
Non-combat skills: 5%
Economy: 55%
magic: 45%
Event manager: 75% (testing)
HD and LD support: 90%

Non-Combat skills: we are currently not focusing on this as they can be fast and simple. We first have to start with stapability, adding the event manager, repackaging (we might), and combat.

We have not gone exactally far. but we have just started and the exams should/are be over (soon), so we will have much more time to use for this project.
